ruling: - If the monster selected by [[Dark Jeroid]] is removed from the field by [[Dimensionhole]], or flipped face-down, or returned to the hand or Deck, or sent to the Graveyard, etc., the effect of [[Dark Jeroid]] is reset and the selected monster no longer has a lowered ATK.
- If [[Dark Jeroid]] is the only monster on the field when it is Summoned, it reduces its own ATK.
- The ATK cannot go below zero.
